alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued November 09 at 11:55AM AKST until November 09 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Thompson Pass. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Widespread falling and blowing snow will produce whiteout conditions at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and wind will continue to diminish through the afternoon.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel very hazardous. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you.If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
